## StoreConfig.magento\_wishlist\_general\_is\_enabled property

Indicates whether wishlists are enabled (1) or disabled (0)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
magento_wishlist_general_is_enabled?: Maybe<Scalars['String']>;
```
